title: pixel 3xl wont charge anymore
content: so today just using my phone normally like how i would always then it was low on battery so i plugged it in to rechard and nothing, no animation, no % going up. So i tried with another charger that worked because i checked it with another device and it was working but when i plug my phone in it dosent. Any help would be amazing.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
